name: Loggerheads in the Adriatic Sea
description: The aim of this project is to investigate the movements performed by loggerhead turtles in the Adriaticsea. The Adriaticsea is home to a quite largenumber of turtles, especially loggerheads, representing one of thebest feeding areas within the Mediterranean Sea. Both juveniles and adult loggerheads frequent this area, and arethought to perform seasonal migrations, especially in response to changes in environmental parameters (especially temperature).
